title: Taskdn Task
description: Schema for Taskdn task file frontmatter. A Task represents a single actionable item.

status.description: The workflow status of the task. Values are case-sensitive and must be lowercase.

updated-at.description: When the task was last modified.

completed-at.description: When the task was completed or dropped. Should be set when status changes to 'done' or 'dropped'.

projects.description: Reference to a Project file. Must be an array with exactly one element. Array format is used for compatibility with other systems.

scheduled.description: The date the task is planned to be worked on. Used for calendar-based planning.

defer-until.description: Hide the task until this date. The task will not appear in active views until this date.

datetime.description: ISO 8601 datetime. Supports both 'T' and space separators, optional seconds, and optional timezone.

dateOrDatetime.description: Either an ISO 8601 date (YYYY-MM-DD) or datetime.

fileReference.description: A reference to another file: WikiLink ([[Page Name]]), relative path (./path/file.md), or filename (file.md).
